import { useRef, useState } from 'react'; import classes from './Form.module.css' export default function FormPage({onClac}) { function submitHandler(event) { event.preventDefault(); console.log('Submit'); onClac(userInputs); } function resetHandler() { console.log('RESET'); } function inputChangeHandler(input,value) { } return(

inputChangeHandler('current-savings', event.target.value) } type="number" id="current-savings" />

inputChangeHandler('yearly-contribution', event.target.value) } type="number" id="yearly-contribution"/>

inputChangeHandler('expected-return', event.target.value) } type="number" id="expected-return" />

) }
